00060 /************************************************************************/
00061 extern rpl_of_t RPL_OF;
00062 static rpl_of_t * const objective_functions[] = {&RPL_OF};
00063 /************************************************************************/
00064 
00065 #ifndef RPL_CONF_MAX_DAG_ENTRIES
00066 #define RPL_MAX_DAG_ENTRIES     2
00067 #else
00068 #define RPL_MAX_DAG_ENTRIES     RPL_CONF_MAX_DAG_ENTRIES
00069 #endif /* !RPL_CONF_MAX_DAG_ENTRIES */
00070 
00071 #ifndef RPL_CONF_MAX_PARENTS
00072 #define RPL_MAX_PARENTS       8
00073 #else
00074 #define RPL_MAX_PARENTS       RPL_CONF_MAX_PARENTS
00075 #endif /* !RPL_CONF_MAX_PARENTS */
00076 /************************************************************************/
00077 /* RPL definitions. */
00078 
00079 #ifndef RPL_CONF_GROUNDED
00080 #define RPL_GROUNDED                    0
00081 #else
00082 #define RPL_GROUNDED                    RPL_CONF_GROUNDED
00083 #endif /* !RPL_CONF_GROUNDED */
00084 
00085 #ifndef RPL_CONF_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN
00086 #define RPL_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN            DEFAULT_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN
00087 #else
00088 #define RPL_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN            RPL_CONF_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN
00089 #endif /* !RPL_CONF_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN */
00090 
00091 #ifndef RPL_CONF_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS
00092 #define RPL_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS      DEFAULT_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS
00093 #else
00094 #define RPL_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS      RPL_CONF_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS
00095 #endif /* !RPL_CONF_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS */
00096 
00097 /************************************************************************/
00098 /* Allocate parents from the same static MEMB chunk to reduce memory waste. */
00099 MEMB(parent_memb, struct rpl_parent, RPL_MAX_PARENTS);
00100 
00101 static rpl_dag_t dag_table[RPL_MAX_DAG_ENTRIES];
00102 /************************************************************************/
00103 /* Remove DAG parents with a rank that is at least the same as minimum_rank. */
00104 static void
00105 remove_parents(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_rank_t minimum_rank)
00106 {
00107   rpl_parent_t *p, *p2;
00108 
00109   PRINTF("RPL: Removing parents (minimum rank %u)\n",
00110         minimum_rank);
00111 
00112   for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = p2) {
00113     p2 = p->next;
00114     if(p->rank >= minimum_rank) {
00115       rpl_remove_parent(dag, p);
00116     }
00117   }
00118 }
00119 /************************************************************************/
00120 static void
00121 remove_worst_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_rank_t min_worst_rank)
00122 {
00123   rpl_parent_t *p, *worst;
00124 
00125   PRINTF("RPL: Removing the worst parent\n");
00126 
00127   /* Find the parent with the highest rank. */
00128   worst = NULL;
00129   for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = list_item_next(p)) {
00130     if(p != dag->preferred_parent &&
00131        (worst == NULL || p->rank > worst->rank)) {
00132       worst = p;
00133     }
00134   }
00135   /* Remove the neighbor if its rank is worse than the minimum worst
00136      rank. */
00137   if(worst != NULL && worst->rank > min_worst_rank) {
00138     rpl_remove_parent(dag, worst);
00139   }
00140 }
00141 /************************************************************************/
00142 static int
00143 should_send_dao(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_dio_t *dio, rpl_parent_t *p)
00144 {
00145   /* if MOP is set to no downward routes no DAO should be sent */
00146   if(dag->mop == RPL_MOP_NO_DOWNWARD_ROUTES) return 0;
00147   return dio->dtsn != p->dtsn && p == dag->preferred_parent;
00148 }
00149 /************************************************************************/
00150 static int
00151 acceptable_rank(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_rank_t rank)
00152 {
00153   return rank != INFINITE_RANK &&
00154     (dag->max_rankinc == 0 ||
00155      DAG_RANK(rank, dag) <= DAG_RANK(dag->min_rank + dag->max_rankinc, dag));
00156 }
00157 /************************************************************************/
00158 rpl_dag_t *
00159 rpl_set_root(uip_ipaddr_t *dag_id)
00160 {
00161   rpl_dag_t *dag;
00162   int version;
00163 
00164   version = -1;
00165   dag = rpl_get_dag(RPL_DEFAULT_INSTANCE);
00166   if(dag != NULL) {
00167     PRINTF("RPL: Dropping a joined DAG when setting this node as root");
00168     version = dag->version;
00169     rpl_free_dag(dag);
00170   }
00171 
00172   dag = rpl_alloc_dag(RPL_DEFAULT_INSTANCE);
00173   if(dag == NULL) {
00174     PRINTF("RPL: Failed to allocate a DAG\n");
00175     return NULL;
00176   }
00177 
00178   dag->joined = 1;
00179   dag->version = version + 1;
00180   dag->grounded = RPL_GROUNDED;
00181   dag->mop = RPL_MOP_DEFAULT;
00182   dag->of = &RPL_OF;
00183   dag->preferred_parent = NULL;
00184   dag->dtsn_out = 1; /* Trigger DAOs from the beginning. */
00185 
00186   memcpy(&dag->dag_id, dag_id, sizeof(dag->dag_id));
00187 
00188   dag->dio_intdoubl = DEFAULT_DIO_INTERVAL_DOUBLINGS;
00189   dag->dio_intmin = DEFAULT_DIO_INTERVAL_MIN;
00190   dag->dio_redundancy = DEFAULT_DIO_REDUNDANCY;
00191   dag->max_rankinc = DEFAULT_MAX_RANKINC;
00192   dag->min_hoprankinc = DEFAULT_MIN_HOPRANKINC;
00193 
00194   dag->default_lifetime = RPL_DEFAULT_LIFETIME;
00195   dag->lifetime_unit = RPL_DEFAULT_LIFETIME_UNIT;
00196 
00197   dag->rank = ROOT_RANK(dag);
00198 
00199   dag->of->update_metric_container(dag);
00200 
00201   PRINTF("RPL: Node set to be a DAG root with DAG ID ");
00202   PRINT6ADDR(&dag->dag_id);
00203   PRINTF("\n");
00204 
00205   ANNOTATE("#A root=%u\n",dag->dag_id.u8[sizeof(dag->dag_id) - 1]);
00206 
00207 
00208   rpl_reset_dio_timer(dag, 1);
00209 
00210   return dag;
00211 }
00212 /************************************************************************/
00213 int
00214 rpl_set_prefix(rpl_dag_t *dag, uip_ipaddr_t *prefix, int len)
00215 {
00216   if(len <= 128) {
00217     memset(&dag->prefix_info.prefix, 0, 16);
00218     memcpy(&dag->prefix_info.prefix, prefix, (len + 7) / 8);
00219     dag->prefix_info.length = len;
00220     dag->prefix_info.flags = UIP_ND6_RA_FLAG_AUTONOMOUS;
00221     PRINTF("RPL: Prefix set - will announce this in DIOs\n");
00222     return 1;
00223   }
00224   return 0;
00225 }
00226 /************************************************************************/
00227 int
00228 rpl_set_default_route(rpl_dag_t *dag, uip_ipaddr_t *from)
00229 {
00230   if(dag->def_route != NULL) {
00231     PRINTF("RPL: Removing default route through ");
00232     PRINT6ADDR(&dag->def_route->ipaddr);
00233     PRINTF("\n");
00234     uip_ds6_defrt_rm(dag->def_route);
00235   }
00236 
00237   if(from != NULL) {
00238     PRINTF("RPL: Adding default route through ");
00239     PRINT6ADDR(from);
00240     PRINTF("\n");
00241     dag->def_route = uip_ds6_defrt_add(from,
00242                                        RPL_LIFETIME(dag,
00243                                                     dag->default_lifetime));
00244     if(dag->def_route == NULL) {
00245       return 0;
00246     }
00247   }
00248 
00249   return 1;
00250 }
00251 /************************************************************************/
00252 rpl_dag_t *
00253 rpl_alloc_dag(uint8_t instance_id)
00254 {
00255   rpl_dag_t *dag;
00256   rpl_dag_t *end;
00257 
00258   for(dag = &dag_table[0], end = dag + RPL_MAX_DAG_ENTRIES; dag < end; dag++) {
00259     if(dag->used == 0) {
00260       memset(dag, 0, sizeof(*dag));
00261       dag->parents = &dag->parent_list;
00262       list_init(dag->parents);
00263       dag->instance_id = instance_id;
00264       dag->def_route = NULL;
00265       dag->rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00266       dag->min_rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00267       return dag;
00268     }
00269   }
00270 
00271   RPL_STAT(rpl_stats.mem_overflows++);
00272   return NULL;
00273 }
00274 /************************************************************************/
00275 void
00276 rpl_free_dag(rpl_dag_t *dag)
00277 {
00278   PRINTF("RPL: Leaving the DAG ");
00279   PRINT6ADDR(&dag->dag_id);
00280   PRINTF("\n");
00281 
00282   /* Remove routes installed by DAOs. */
00283   rpl_remove_routes(dag);
00284 
00285   /* Remove parents and the default route. */
00286   remove_parents(dag, 0);
00287   rpl_set_default_route(dag, NULL);
00288 
00289   ctimer_stop(&dag->dio_timer);
00290   ctimer_stop(&dag->dao_timer);
00291 
00292   dag->used = 0;
00293   dag->joined = 0;
00294 }
00295 /************************************************************************/
00296 rpl_parent_t *
00297 rpl_add_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_dio_t *dio, uip_ipaddr_t *addr)
00298 {
00299   rpl_parent_t *p;
00300 
00301   p = memb_alloc(&parent_memb);
00302   if(p == NULL) {
00303     RPL_STAT(rpl_stats.mem_overflows++);
00304     return NULL;
00305   }
00306 
00307   memcpy(&p->addr, addr, sizeof(p->addr));
00308   p->dag = dag;
00309   p->rank = dio->rank;
00310   p->link_metric = INITIAL_LINK_METRIC;
00311   p->dtsn = 0;
00312 
00313   memcpy(&p->mc, &dio->mc, sizeof(p->mc));
00314 
00315   list_add(dag->parents, p);
00316 
00317   return p;
00318 }
00319 /************************************************************************/
00320 rpl_parent_t *
00321 rpl_find_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag, uip_ipaddr_t *addr)
00322 {
00323   rpl_parent_t *p;
00324 
00325   for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = p->next) {
00326     if(uip_ipaddr_cmp(&p->addr, addr)) {
00327       return p;
00328     }
00329   }
00330 
00331   return NULL;
00332 }
00333 
00334 /************************************************************************/
00335 rpl_parent_t *
00336 rpl_select_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag)
00337 {
00338   rpl_parent_t *p;
00339   rpl_parent_t *best;
00340 
00341   best = NULL;
00342   for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = p->next) {
00343     if(p->rank == INFINITE_RANK) {
00344       /* ignore this neighbor */
00345     } else if(best == NULL) {
00346       best = p;
00347     } else {
00348       best = dag->of->best_parent(best, p);
00349     }
00350   }
00351 
00352   if(best == NULL) {
00353     /* need to handle update of best... */
00354     return NULL;
00355   }
00356 
00357   if(dag->preferred_parent != best) {
00358     PRINTF("RPL: Sending a No-Path DAO to old DAO parent\n");
00359     dao_output(dag->preferred_parent, ZERO_LIFETIME);
00360 
00361     dag->preferred_parent = best; /* Cache the value. */
00362     dag->of->update_metric_container(dag);
00363     rpl_set_default_route(dag, &best->addr);
00364     /* The DAO parent set changed - schedule a DAO transmission. */
00365     if(dag->mop != RPL_MOP_NO_DOWNWARD_ROUTES) {
00366       rpl_schedule_dao(dag);
00367     }
00368     rpl_reset_dio_timer(dag, 1);
00369     PRINTF("RPL: New preferred parent, rank changed from %u to %u\n",
00370            (unsigned)dag->rank, dag->of->calculate_rank(best, 0));
00371     RPL_STAT(rpl_stats.parent_switch++);
00372   }
00373 
00374   /* Update the DAG rank, since link-layer information may have changed
00375      the local confidence. */
00376   dag->rank = dag->of->calculate_rank(best, 0);
00377   if(dag->rank < dag->min_rank) {
00378     dag->min_rank = dag->rank;
00379   } else if(!acceptable_rank(dag, best->rank)) {
00380     /* Send a No-Path DAO to the soon-to-be-removed preferred parent. */
00381     dao_output(best, ZERO_LIFETIME);
00382 
00383     remove_parents(dag, 0);
00384     return NULL;
00385   }
00386 
00387   return best;
00388 }
00389 /************************************************************************/
00390 int
00391 rpl_remove_parent(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_parent_t *parent)
00392 {
00393   uip_ds6_defrt_t *defrt;
00394 
00395   /* Remove uIPv6 routes that have this parent as the next hop. **/
00396   uip_ds6_route_rm_by_nexthop(&parent->addr);
00397   defrt = uip_ds6_defrt_lookup(&parent->addr);
00398   if(defrt != NULL) {
00399     PRINTF("RPL: Removing default route ");
00400     PRINT6ADDR(&parent->addr);
00401     PRINTF("\n");
00402     uip_ds6_defrt_rm(defrt);
00403     dag->def_route = NULL;
00404   }
00405 
00406   PRINTF("RPL: Removing parent ");
00407   PRINT6ADDR(&parent->addr);
00408   PRINTF("\n");
00409 
00410   if(parent == dag->preferred_parent) {
00411     dag->preferred_parent = NULL;
00412   }
00413 
00414   list_remove(dag->parents, parent);
00415   memb_free(&parent_memb, parent);
00416   return 0;
00417 }
00418 /************************************************************************/
00419 rpl_dag_t *
00420 rpl_get_dag(int instance_id)
00421 {
00422   int i;
00423 
00424   for(i = 0; i < RPL_MAX_DAG_ENTRIES; i++) {
00425     if(dag_table[i].joined && (instance_id == RPL_ANY_INSTANCE ||
00426                                dag_table[i].instance_id == instance_id)) {
00427       return &dag_table[i];
00428     }
00429   }
00430   return NULL;
00431 }
00432 /************************************************************************/
00433 rpl_of_t *
00434 rpl_find_of(rpl_ocp_t ocp)
00435 {
00436   unsigned int i;
00437 
00438   for(i = 0;
00439       i < sizeof(objective_functions) / sizeof(objective_functions[0]); 
00440       i++) {
00441     if(objective_functions[i]->ocp == ocp) {
00442       return objective_functions[i];
00443     }
00444   }
00445 
00446   return NULL;
00447 }
00448 /************************************************************************/
00449 static void
00450 join_dag(uip_ipaddr_t *from, rpl_dio_t *dio)
00451 {
00452   rpl_dag_t *dag;
00453   rpl_parent_t *p;
00454   rpl_of_t *of;
00455 
00456   dag = rpl_alloc_dag(dio->instance_id);
00457   if(dag == NULL) {
00458     PRINTF("RPL: Failed to allocate a DAG object!\n");
00459     return;
00460   }
00461 
00462   p = rpl_add_parent(dag, dio, from);
00463   PRINTF("RPL: Adding ");
00464   PRINT6ADDR(from);
00465   PRINTF(" as a parent: ");
00466   if(p == NULL) {
00467     PRINTF("failed\n");
00468     return;
00469   }
00470   PRINTF("succeeded\n");
00471 
00472   /* Determine the objective function by using the
00473      objective code point of the DIO. */
00474   of = rpl_find_of(dio->ocp);
00475   if(of == NULL) {
00476     PRINTF("RPL: DIO for DAG instance %u does not specify a supported OF\n",
00477         dio->instance_id);
00478     return;
00479   }
00480 
00481   /* Autoconfigure an address if this node does not already have an address
00482      with this prefix. */
00483   if((dio->prefix_info.flags & UIP_ND6_RA_FLAG_AUTONOMOUS)) {
00484     uip_ipaddr_t ipaddr;
00485     /* assume that the prefix ends with zeros! */
00486     memcpy(&ipaddr, &dio->prefix_info.prefix, 16);
00487     uip_ds6_set_addr_iid(&ipaddr, &uip_lladdr);
00488     if(uip_ds6_addr_lookup(&ipaddr) == NULL) {
00489       PRINTF("RPL: adding global IP address ");
00490       PRINT6ADDR(&ipaddr);
00491       PRINTF("\n");
00492       uip_ds6_addr_add(&ipaddr, 0, ADDR_AUTOCONF);
00493     }
00494   }
00495 
00496   dag->joined = 1;
00497   dag->used = 1;
00498   dag->of = of;
00499   dag->grounded = dio->grounded;
00500   dag->mop = dio->mop;
00501   dag->preference = dio->preference;
00502   dag->instance_id = dio->instance_id;
00503 
00504   dag->max_rankinc = dio->dag_max_rankinc;
00505   dag->min_hoprankinc = dio->dag_min_hoprankinc;
00506 
00507   dag->version = dio->version;
00508   dag->preferred_parent = p;
00509   dag->of->update_metric_container(dag);
00510 
00511   dag->dio_intdoubl = dio->dag_intdoubl;
00512   dag->dio_intmin = dio->dag_intmin;
00513   dag->dio_redundancy = dio->dag_redund;
00514 
00515   memcpy(&dag->dag_id, &dio->dag_id, sizeof(dio->dag_id));
00516 
00517   /* copy prefix information into the dag */
00518   memcpy(&dag->prefix_info, &dio->prefix_info, sizeof(rpl_prefix_t));
00519 
00520   dag->rank = dag->of->calculate_rank(p, dio->rank);
00521   dag->min_rank = dag->rank; /* So far this is the lowest rank we know of. */
00522 
00523   PRINTF("RPL: Joined DAG with instance ID %u, rank %hu, DAG ID ",
00524          dio->instance_id, dag->rank);
00525   PRINT6ADDR(&dag->dag_id);
00526   PRINTF("\n");
00527 
00528   ANNOTATE("#A join=%u\n",dag->dag_id.u8[sizeof(dag->dag_id) - 1]);
00529 
00530 
00531   dag->default_lifetime = dio->default_lifetime;
00532   dag->lifetime_unit = dio->lifetime_unit;
00533 
00534   rpl_reset_dio_timer(dag, 1);
00535   rpl_set_default_route(dag, from);
00536 
00537   if(should_send_dao(dag, dio, p)) {
00538     rpl_schedule_dao(dag);
00539   } else {
00540     PRINTF("RPL: The DIO does not meet the prerequisites for sending a DAO\n");
00541   }
00542 }
00543 /************************************************************************/
00544 static void
00545 global_repair(uip_ipaddr_t *from, rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_dio_t *dio)
00546 {
00547   rpl_parent_t *p;
00548 
00549   remove_parents(dag, 0);
00550   dag->version = dio->version;
00551   dag->dtsn_out = 1;
00552   dag->of->reset(dag);
00553   if((p = rpl_add_parent(dag, dio, from)) == NULL) {
00554     PRINTF("RPL: Failed to add a parent during the global repair\n");
00555     dag->rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00556   } else {
00557     rpl_set_default_route(dag, from);
00558     dag->rank = dag->of->calculate_rank(NULL, dio->rank);
00559     dag->min_rank = dag->rank;
00560     rpl_reset_dio_timer(dag, 1);
00561     if(should_send_dao(dag, dio, p)) {
00562       rpl_schedule_dao(dag);
00563     }
00564   }
00565   PRINTF("RPL: Participating in a global repair (version=%u, rank=%hu)\n",
00566          dag->version, dag->rank);
00567 
00568   RPL_STAT(rpl_stats.global_repairs++);
00569 }
00570 /************************************************************************/
00571 int
00572 rpl_repair_dag(rpl_dag_t *dag)
00573 {
00574   if(dag->rank == ROOT_RANK(dag)) {
00575     dag->version++;
00576     dag->dtsn_out = 1;
00577     rpl_reset_dio_timer(dag, 1);
00578     return 1;
00579   }
00580   return 0;
00581 }
00582 /************************************************************************/
00583 void
00584 rpl_local_repair(rpl_dag_t *dag)
00585 {
00586   PRINTF("RPL: Starting a local DAG repair\n");
00587 
00588   dag->rank = INFINITE_RANK;
00589   remove_parents(dag, 0);
00590   rpl_reset_dio_timer(dag, 1);
00591 
00592   RPL_STAT(rpl_stats.local_repairs++);
00593 }
00594 /************************************************************************/
00595 void
00596 rpl_recalculate_ranks(void)
00597 {
00598   rpl_dag_t *dag;
00599   rpl_parent_t *p;
00600 
00601   /*
00602    * We recalculate ranks when we receive feedback from the system rather
00603    * than RPL protocol messages. This periodical recalculation is called
00604    * from a timer in order to keep the stack depth reasonably low.
00605    */
00606   dag = rpl_get_dag(RPL_ANY_INSTANCE);
00607   if(dag != NULL) {
00608     for(p = list_head(dag->parents); p != NULL; p = p->next) {
00609       if(p->updated) {
00610         p->updated = 0;
00611         rpl_process_parent_event(dag, p);
00612         /*
00613          * Stop calculating here because the parent list may have changed.
00614          * If more ranks need to be recalculated, it will be taken care of
00615          * in subsequent calls to this functions.
00616          */
00617         break;
00618       }
00619     }
00620   }
00621 }
00622 /************************************************************************/
00623 int
00624 rpl_process_parent_event(rpl_dag_t *dag, rpl_parent_t *p)
00625 {
00626   rpl_rank_t parent_rank;
00627   rpl_rank_t old_rank;
00628 
00629   /* Update the parent rank. */
00630   parent_rank = p->rank;
00631   old_rank = dag->rank;
00632 
00633   if(rpl_select_parent(dag) == NULL) {
00634     /* No suitable parent; trigger a local repair. */
00635     PRINTF("RPL: No parents found in a DAG\n");
00636     rpl_local_repair(dag);
00637     return 1;
00638   }
00639 
00640   if(DAG_RANK(old_rank, dag) != DAG_RANK(dag->rank, dag)) {
00641     if(dag->rank < dag->min_rank) {
00642       dag->min_rank = dag->rank;
00643     }
00644     PRINTF("RPL: Moving in the DAG from rank %hu to %hu\n",
00645            DAG_RANK(old_rank, dag), DAG_RANK(dag->rank, dag));
00646     PRINTF("RPL: The preferred parent is ");
00647     PRINT6ADDR(&dag->preferred_parent->addr);
00648     PRINTF(" (rank %u)\n",
00649            (unsigned)DAG_RANK(dag->preferred_parent->rank, dag));
00650     rpl_reset_dio_timer(dag, 1);
00651   }
00652 
00653   if(parent_rank == INFINITE_RANK ||
00654      !acceptable_rank(dag, dag->of->calculate_rank(NULL, parent_rank))) {
00655     /* The candidate parent is no longer valid: the rank increase resulting
00656        from the choice of it as a parent would be too high. */
00657     return 0;
00658   }
00659 
00660   return 1;
00661 }
00662 /************************************************************************/
00663 void
00664 rpl_process_dio(uip_ipaddr_t *from, rpl_dio_t *dio)
00665 {
00666   rpl_dag_t *dag;
00667   rpl_parent_t *p;
00668 
00669   if(dio->mop != RPL_MOP_DEFAULT) {
00670     PRINTF("RPL: Ignoring a DIO with an unsupported MOP: %d\n", dio->mop);
00671     return;
00672   }
00673 
00674   dag = rpl_get_dag(dio->instance_id);
00675   if(dag == NULL) {
00676     /* Join the first possible DAG of this RPL instance. */
00677     if(dio->rank != INFINITE_RANK) {
00678       join_dag(from, dio);
00679     } else {
00680       PRINTF("RPL: Ignoring DIO from node with infinite rank: ");
00681       PRINT6ADDR(from);
00682       PRINTF("\n");
00683     }
00684     return;
00685   }
00686 
00687   if(memcmp(&dag->dag_id, &dio->dag_id, sizeof(dag->dag_id))) {
00688     PRINTF("RPL: Ignoring DIO for another DAG within our instance\n");
00689     return;
00690   }
00691 
00692   if(dio->version > dag->version) {
00693     if(dag->rank == ROOT_RANK(dag)) {
00694       PRINTF("RPL: Root received inconsistent DIO version number\n");
00695       dag->version = dio->version + 1;
00696       rpl_reset_dio_timer(dag, 1);
00697     } else {
00698       global_repair(from, dag, dio);
00699     }
00700     return;
00701   } else if(dio->version < dag->version) {
00702     /* Inconsistency detected - someone is still on old version */
00703     PRINTF("RPL: old version received => inconsistency detected\n");
00704     rpl_reset_dio_timer(dag, 1);
00705     return;
00706   }
00707 
00708   if(dio->rank == INFINITE_RANK) {
00709     rpl_reset_dio_timer(dag, 1);
00710   } else if(dio->rank < ROOT_RANK(dag)) {
00711     PRINTF("RPL: Ignoring DIO with too low rank: %u\n",
00712            (unsigned)dio->rank);
00713     return;
00714   }
00715 
00716   if(dag->rank == ROOT_RANK(dag)) {
00717     if(dio->rank != INFINITE_RANK) {
00718       dag->dio_counter++;
00719     }
00720     return;
00721   }
00722 
00723   /*
00724    * At this point, we know that this DIO pertains to a DAG that
00725    * we are already part of. We consider the sender of the DIO to be
00726    * a candidate parent, and let rpl_process_parent_event decide
00727    * whether to keep it in the set.
00728    */
00729 
00730   p = rpl_find_parent(dag, from);
00731   if(p == NULL) {
00732     if(RPL_PARENT_COUNT(dag) == RPL_MAX_PARENTS) {
00733       /* Make room for a new parent. */
00734       remove_worst_parent(dag, dio->rank);
00735     }
00736     
00737     /* Add the DIO sender as a candidate parent. */
00738     p = rpl_add_parent(dag, dio, from);
00739     if(p == NULL) {
00740       PRINTF("RPL: Failed to add a new parent (");
00741       PRINT6ADDR(from);
00742       PRINTF(")\n");
00743       return;
00744     }
00745 
00746     PRINTF("RPL: New candidate parent with rank %u: ", (unsigned)p->rank);
00747     PRINT6ADDR(from);
00748     PRINTF("\n");
00749   } else if(DAG_RANK(p->rank, dag) == DAG_RANK(dio->rank, dag)) {
00750     PRINTF("RPL: Received consistent DIO\n");
00751     dag->dio_counter++;
00752   }
00753   
00754   /* We have allocated a candidate parent; process the DIO further. */
00755 
00756   memcpy(&p->mc, &dio->mc, sizeof(p->mc));    
00757   p->rank = dio->rank;
00758   if(rpl_process_parent_event(dag, p) == 0) {
00759     /* The candidate parent no longer exists. */
00760     return;
00761   }
00762   
00763   if(should_send_dao(dag, dio, p)) {
00764     rpl_schedule_dao(dag);
00765   }
00766   
00767   p->dtsn = dio->dtsn;
00768 }
00769 /************************************************************************/
00770
